text: Oliver James Bearman (born 8 May 2005) is a British racing driver, currently competing in Formula 2 for Prema Racing and being an Reserve Driver for Ferrari and Haas. In 2025, Bearman will drive for Haas. His teammate will be Esteban Ocon. ==References== Category:2005 births Category:Living people Category:English Formula One drivers
title: Oliver Bearman
